transcript:
Customer: Hello, Namaste IndiaMART.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Hello. Haan sir bataiye sir. Pichhe phone aapke.
Executive: Sir aaj 29 tarikh hai.
Customer: Ek baar aap agar ho sake to usko kara de sir.
Executive: Ruko ruko dekhte hain.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir ek aapka sir main batata hu aaj ₹20949 aapka total bacha hua hai. Agar please agar hota hai to aaj kara do sir.
Executive: Ruko.
Customer: Haan line pe hu sir, line pe hu.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir. Danny bhai.
Executive: Kya sir? Woh kara deta hu na.
Customer: Barabar phone aai jab yaad aai.
Customer: Ab barabar phone aai jab yaad aai.
Executive: Hain.
Executive: Abhi ek dedh ghante baad.
Executive: Sir aap kar rahe hain?
Executive: Sir ek dedh ghanta.
Customer: Hello. Aap boliye sir.
Executive: Ek dedh ghante baad hoga sir.
Customer: Ek dedh ghante baad matlab chhe saat, saade saat tak ho jayega sir?
Executive: Haan ho jayega ho jayega.
Customer: Nahi sir ek mera request bura nahi ho jayega. Main actually aapka jo hai na ₹20949 bacha hua hai. Total ek hi baar kar dena.
Executive: Kyu nahi, isme toh main nahi kara sakta. Theek theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Lekin aaj sir please aaj kar dena.
Executive: Nahi kara, kara dunga kara dunga.
Customer: Haan. Theek hai na?
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Hello. Haan sir boliye boliye boliye sir. Haan aur kuch kiya catalog change kiya?
Customer: Haan sir aapki update main kar raha hu. Aapki profile bhi update kar raha hu. Aap dekhiyega kal tak aapka pura profile bhi update ho jayega koi dikkat nahi hai. Main isko kar dunga baki aapka jo payment hai usse thoda sa.
Executive: Theek hai. Hello. Hello. Haan bolo.
Customer: Haan bolo sir. Toh jo aapki haan wohi main bol raha hu sir ki jo aapka catalog hai woh mujhe aap photos ek baar de dijiyega. Main Google se photos uthau ya phir aap mujhe dijiyega photos.
Executive: Are sir ji ek minute ruko. Naam batao mere products ke main abhi aapko photo send kar deta hu.
Customer: Ek second ruko. Product ke naam batao.
Customer: Line pe rahiye. Shri Shri Nath ji ka lag raha hai na photo ye?
Customer: Kya sir?
Customer: Shri Nath ji wala lag raha hai na photo?
Customer: Haan haan haan main aapko batata hu. Just line pe rahiye.
Executive: Suno suno. Jo Shri Nath ji ka hai. Isme photo laga hua hai already. Hain na?
Customer: Haan laga hua hai. Haan.
Executive: Phir kaunse mein dekhna hai batao mere ko aap. Haan line pe rahiye.
Executive: Woh system bhi maine chalu kar rakha hai ab aap batao.
Customer: Main open kar liya hu sir.
Executive: Haan. Sir ye jo aapka haan. Ek second sir.
Executive: Ye laga hua hai. Sir ye jo Marvel Shiva parivar statue hai na iska mujhe do photos chahiye.
Executive: Marvel Shiv parivar se Marvel Shiv statue pe bhi photo laga hua hai.
Customer: Ek photo laga hua hai sir. Har photos mein teen teen photos honi chahiye.
Executive: Achha achha teen photo lagni chahiye. Haan haan teen photo.
Customer: Haan toh woh aap mujhe ek aapka Marvel Meera bai statue bhi karte hue bhej dijiyega uske photos uske don hai. 1000 by 1000 se above honi chahiye photos ki quality.
Executive: Theek hai. Haan ji karta hu.
Customer: Haan ye aur uske baad sir aapka Marvel Ram Lakshman Hanuman ji statue isme bhi aapka do photos chahiye. Marvel Ram Lakshman Hanuman ji statue.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Iska bhi photos mujhe chahiye sir.
Executive: Ek kaam karo aap kal Monday ko kar le. Monday ko bhi nahi ho payega.
Customer: Haan haan Monday ko kar dijiyega kara dijiyega main update kar dunga.
Executive: Monday ko nahi. Monday ko nahi ho payega. Monday ke hamare bahut bhare din hai nahi ho payega. Hum usme busy rahenge. Monday ko calling mat karna mere paas.
Customer: Theek hai. Monday ko nahi call karenge sir. Lekin sir aaj aaj woh wala kar dena request hai sir.
Executive: Haan naam batao ek toh Shiv statue hai na. Shiv statue. Haan Shiv Shiv Shiv Shiv parivar statue.
Executive: Shiv parivar nahi sorry main Shiva ka bhej raha hu aapko. Shiva pe dalo.
Customer: Theek hai. Ye main dal dunga. Main Shiva ka dal raha hu aapko photo. Abhi dal agar system pe ho toh dal do main bhej diya maan lo aapke paas.
Customer: Sir ye WhatsApp pe hai na woh main kar dunga khol ke main update kar dunga aaj hi. Aaj hi kar dunga koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Executive: Oh ye lo ek second. Ye lo ye Shiva ka toh kar diya maine char photo kar diye aapke. Theek hai. Aur Shiv Shiv. Haan ye Ram Lakshman Hanuman ji statue.
Executive: Ruko ruko ek ek toh karne do mere ko Shiv parivar. Ek ek serial wise karne do. Thoda dhyan rahega.
Customer: Bheja sir aapne?
Executive: Nahi bhej raha hu sir ji photo toh haan photo nikal raha hu. Aur ye Shiv parivar ka bhej diya maine.
Customer: Theek hai. Aur bolo. Aur Ram Lakshman Hanuman ji statue hai na. Haan haan bas bas. Ram Lakshman Hanuman statue. Ram Lakshman wala bhej raha hu. Ram Lakshman wala bhej raha hu.
Customer: Baki sir aaj jo rest amount hai usko aap.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ruko sir ji ruko mere ko ek ek kaam karne do mera dimag udhar lag raha hai. Photo send karne mein mere ko aap.
Customer: Dimag sir ka dimag usme lag jata hai.
Executive: Sir ji dekho hamari kya hai ab aaj ko bhai bandi ka hai usme uljhe hue hai. Aaj din bhar se hamare paas. I know sir I know sir I know sir. Rishtedar aaye hue hai iske liye thoda time dena padta hai sare kaam karne padte hai. Hamare ghar mehman bhi aaye hue hai aisa nahi hai.
Customer: Achha mehman bhi aaye hue hai sir aapke. Lekin humko humko jante ho sir hansi kab aaya jab aapne bola ki client aake mere samne baitha hua hai. Aap aapke sasur baithe hue the aur mujhe bole ki client aake baitha hua hai.
Executive: Sir ab woh toh sunne ka fark pad jata hai.
Customer: Achha sunne ka fark. Haan sunne ka aapke sunne mein aa gaya hoga client aaya hua hai. Maine bola tha guest aaye hai mere ko. Sunne ka difference bhi ho gaya hoga.
Customer: Payment ho gaya sir?
Executive: Haan sir ji maine saare. Haan ho gaya ho gaya ho gaya. Sir lekin haan aap bejh dijiye main bejh dijiye. Bejh dijiye koi baat nahi. Sir lekin 7:30 baje aap payment kara dena sir. Please main aapko yaad dila deta hu ₹20949. ₹949 bhi kar dena sir.
Customer: Haan ji. Okay. ₹949 bhi kar dena.
Executive: Kar dunga kar dunga. Theek hai sir. Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to complete the payment of ₹20949.

- Needs photos for Marvel Meera Bai statue.

- Needs photos for Marvel Ram Lakshman Hanuman statue.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to send photos of Shiva statue.

- Executive sent photos of Shiv Parivar and Ram Lakshman.

- Executive requested to make the payment by 7:30 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send the remaining photos on Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, photos, statues, catalog, update
